page.title: 10Yorkshire Imperial I
page.content: There are two companies trading on the site at{Haigh Park Road: (a) Yorkshire Imperial Ltd.{(IMI {YI) (b) Yorkshire Imperial Plastics Ltd.{(IMI YIP) Both enterprises are owned by the well known, publicly quoted company, IMI plc of Witton, Birmingham. {IMI YI}is world famous for the manufacture of copper and copper alloy tubes and fittings. Its sister company,{IMI YIP}is also world famous, but in the field of plastic pipes, fittings and other products. Leeds is just one of the sites in the UK where{IMI YI}carries out its business. Originally, the site was a famous racecourse, where the St. Leger was run in the early 19th century, before its transfer to Doncaster. (to be continued)
